issue.title: Add email notification after third-party request validation
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

#644 added order validation process when a request is done with a third-party. An email notification is send to the validation manager(s) to ask for valoidation. 

This enhancement consists of adding a second email notification after the validation (or reject). This is usefull because this email will inform all accounts who have the "validation manager" role (the same who received the first email notification, before validation). By doing this, all actors are informed before and after validation (or reject).



**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
